name: Guardians Of The Palace
description:
The hero seek out the demon to slay him, but the demon is hiding in the great mind palace, a labyrinth perfect for the demon to hide.

Control your character with WASD or arrows.

There is 3 different ending, hope you can find them all. (Just kidding, hope you doesn't find the worst one)

It's quite rushed but i hope you can enjoy playing it.

CREDIT

Art of silence by uniq
https://soundcloud.com/uniqofficial 
Music provided by https://www.plugnplaymusic.net

Dark Sad Fantasy Music - Labyrinth Of Lost Dreams by Darren Curtis

-
